adviseScripts.text: I'm worried.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: For some reason, whenever I see you, all sorts of deep sexual desires keep surging up in my mind...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Oh! Oh my...!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: (Run away.)
We should go outside and get some fresh air.
Wh-where are you going, Believer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text:
I need you to XXX me for...
No! I mean, I need you to counsel me for a long, long time!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: *Gasp* Outside?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: You want me to do th-that stuff out in the open, without walls or anything?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: How could you be so... so... so dirty!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I have a dangerous conversation with Rapunzel.
Sometimes, I can't help thinking about the past.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I know it's meaningless to get hung up on the past, but I just can't help it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: What should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Just do your best to live in the present.
Grieve as much as you want, then move on when you're ready.
That's a great answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: As I thought, you are a stronger person than me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I thought you would tell me to be strong. Your advice is rather disappointing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: But... it actually makes me feel a little more relieved. Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I have a deep conversation with Rapunzel.
Praying at the church supposedly cleanses the mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: But, I think it has the opposite effect on me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Do you know why that could be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Maybe you're too aware of your own immorality.
No, and I don't want to know.
*Gasp* What are you saying?! You mean...?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: When you watch me pray, is that what you're thinking about?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: How can you be so immoral...! *Gasp*
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I swear, I'm not like that at all.
Aw. What a pity.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Rapunzel's serious concerns.
Believer, I wonder...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: What kind of books do you like?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Erotic and romantic novels.
Overly passionate adventure novels.
R-romantic novels...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: A man and woman meet, tied to a tragic fate...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: But on page two, they're already doing XXX? And by page three, it's XXX? You mean that kind of...?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Stop ruining my innocence.
... Overly passionate?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... I don't quite understand...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text:
Could you help me understand...
Exactly what kind of passionate things you're looking for?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I have a dangerous conversation with Rapunzel.
Believer...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: What is your fetis... I mean, what is your ideal type?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: A person who is true to their own desires.
A person who has great common sense.
That... that means...!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: You like people who can honestly enjoy themselves in any situation?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: ... Wait. Isn't that me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Th-... Um... That...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: ... is a hard place that I can never reach.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I discuss ideal types with Rapunzel.
Believer, when you want something from someone else...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Do you just ask politely? Or do you really go for what you want?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I make my desires known.
I just ask politely.
I see. You have good self-control.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: But you should consider that maybe the other person... wants something, too!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Ah. I-I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Do you just keep going, until you hear... the sounds of surrender?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: ... I-incredible.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I have an odd conversation with Rapunzel.
How is life in the Ark?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: It's pretty great. I'm happy.
It's unbearable.
... So you like it there, too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: You're the kind of optimist who sees everything as an opportunity.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: That's definitely a blessing from God.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Ah...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: It's at times like this that I must remind myself:
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Though everyone is suffering, it falls to us to reclaim the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I have a deep conversation with Rapunzel.
My hobby is writing novels.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I'm almost done with one now, but I can't think of a proper ending.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I need your help, Believer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: "The friend who called me over was nowhere to be seen, but I could hear that water was running in the shower."
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: "Curious, I opened the shower door just a crack and peeked inside..."
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Stop! It's the A.C.P.U.!
Inside was an ancient king who's been sealed away for 2000 years.
Wow. That was a quick genre change.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: But, plot twists are all the rage these days...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: That's right. If it was trapped somewhere for 2000 years, I'd want a shower, too, before I...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I discuss novels with Rapunzel.
Believer, do you believe in the existence of the soul?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Do you think we Nikkes have souls as well?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I don't believe in souls.
I think Nikkes must have them.
... Got it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: But I still want to believe in them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Haha. There may be no proof...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: But, I hold the same opinion.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: To be exact, I really hope we do.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I hope we're more than just machines...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Rapunzel on a serious topic.
Believer, do lead with the lips or the tongue?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: ... What?
... Depends on the other person.
Haha! I'm talking about when you eat, of course.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Oh! Were you... thinking of something else?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Then... can you tell me your answer for the other thing as well?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Huh? Other person?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: What other person? I'm just talking about eating.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: What's going on in your head to make you say something like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I spend time talking about useless things with Rapunzel.
Whenever you're walking up on the surface and glance up at the sky,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: you can see all kinds of clouds floating around.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Some are shaped like rabbits, some like hearts, and others...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Gasp!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: What? What do you see?
It's a cloud... shaped like a gasp?
So you're curious, are you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Allow me to explain it to you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Lean in a little bit closer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: What a peculiar shape.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Tell me, what does it look like?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Rapunzel about various types of clouds.
Believer, my heart is heavy today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: ... Can you pray with me for all of the sisters that we lost?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Pray without saying a word.
Ask what is going on.
Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Well...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: It might be a long story.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Would it be possible to pray first?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I pray together with Rapunzel.
What a tranquil place this is.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: It's worlds apart from the rest of the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Let's live here together.
One day the surface will be like this. I'll make it so.
You mean to live together, and do everything together?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: When you want something, you really just go for it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: But in all seriousness...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I appreciate the offer, but I can't do that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: If anyone can make that a reality,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: it's you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I'll be by your side protecting you the entire way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Rapunzel and I both envisioned bringing peace back to the surface.
I hear that once people establish a rapport, they often give each other nicknames.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: How about we do the same?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Gaspunzel.
Honey.
Hmm... I like it,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: but are you sure it's not too hard for you to pronounce?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Is that the same "Honey" that I'm thinking of?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: As in, "Hey Honey, it's our honeymoon"? That kind of thing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I didn't realize you wanted to take our relationship to the next level!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I spend some time with Rapunzel coming up with unique nicknames.
I'm so booooored. How about we play First Letter, Last Letter?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Chef
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Fervor.
Fond.
R... what's a word that starts with R...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Ah, Rendezvous!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Hey!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Are you saying you're fond of me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Since we're more than just acquaintances now, does that mean you're thinking of taking me and...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I spend some time with Rapunzel playing First Letter, Last Letter.
I enjoy spending time with you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I don't want to forget a single second of it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Let's keep creating new memories.
I'll remember all of it as well.
Yes, let's do that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: The thought of us continue to create new memories
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: makes me happier than you can imagine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I am confident that you will.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: But in the end, I will not.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: The lone survivor... the last one left behind... what a sad, lonely fate.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I hope such a fate never befalls you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Rapunzel and I share some of our memories.
While wandering up on the surface,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I found this beautiful area where you can see flowers as far as the eye can see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I'd love to see it for myself.
Is there really such a place up on the surface?
If we ever manage to get things straightened out up on the surface,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I'll take you there one day. Promise.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: It's so beautiful, it'll bring tears to your eyes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Of course, more than you think.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: All of you ever see of the surface is battle and bloodshed,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: but I see it in all of its variegated splendor.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: One day, I hope I can show you some of the things I've seen.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Rapunzel and I discuss how beautiful the surface can be.
I went to the library a few days ago, and there were so many good books to choose from.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Do you visit the library frequently?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I've read most of their entire book collection at this point.
I'm not a big reader.
Then have you read "XX plus X equals..."?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: It was so incredibly... descriptive, don't you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: That's too bad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Reading helps calm your mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I think reading once in a while could be good for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Rapunzel and I talk more about reading.
Believer, do you own anything that has sentimental value, but no practical usage?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Sure I do.
No.
During my wanderings up on the surface, I find all sorts of knick-knacks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: When I think of how much they must have meant to other people,
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I can't help but grow attached to them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: As I expected.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I think it is a good idea for you to find something like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Small things like that can be a kind of tether keeping you connected to our world.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Rapunzel and I share a deep conversation.
Scarlet is so good at whistling a tune. I find it fascinating.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Are you any good at whistling?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Yes.
No.
Then can you teach me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Every time I hear Scarlet whistling, I get so jealous!
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Close your lips like this, then curl your tongue.
Close my lips like this...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: ... and then what? Fffffssssss...
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: I'm hopeless when it comes to whistling as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Next time I see Scarlet, I'll ask her to teach me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Rapunzel

adviseScripts.text: Rapunzel and I discuss the fine art of whistling.
